sqlMap.update: /* alterNode for BoardManagement */ UPDATE T_BOARD_INDI_SETTING SET C_TITLE = #c_title# WHERE C_ID = #c_id#
sqlMap.select: /* getNode for BoardManagement */ SELECT C_ID , C_PARENTID , C_POSITION , C_LEFT , C_RIGHT , C_LEVEL , C_TITLE , C_TYPE FROM T_BOARD_INDI_SETTING WHERE C_ID = #c_id#
